pullRequest.title: xds: eliminate special code path for EDS-only workflow
pullRequest.bodyText:
Corresponding change in C-core: grpc/grpc#22648
Eliminated the adapter class (i.e., XdsLoadBalancer) for running standalone EDS lb policy, in which name resolver receives a service config the specifies "xds_experimental" as the load balancing policy and the load balancing config is parsed to XdsConfig.
Still preserve the capability of running EDS lb policy alone without fallback. Running EDS only requires the same format of EDS lb config for running it with full CDS-EDS flow.

commit.message: Delete classes for EDS only workflow.
Eliminate callback logic in EDS lb policy, which was used for triggering fallback.
Gracefully handle missing EDS config, as the config can be from the external service config.

beforeCommit.message: Gracefully handle missing EDS config, as the config can be from the external service config.

commit.message: Add unit test for CdsLoadBalancerProvider, cover logic for parsing CDS lb config.

beforeCommit.message: Add unit test for CdsLoadBalancerProvider, cover logic for parsing CDS lb config.

afterCommit.message: Add unit test for CdsLoadBalancerProvider, cover logic for parsing CDS lb config.

commit.message: Remove check for changing cluster name in received EDS config. We may allow this for EDS only workflow.
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:grpc/grpc-java into refactor/eliminate_eds_only_work_flow
